json: {"filters":[["Sales Invoice","company","=","Conexiones Equipos y Bombas SA de CV"]],"fields":[["name","Sales Invoice"],["docstatus","Sales Invoice"],["status","Sales Invoice"],["title","Sales Invoice"],["grand_total","Sales Invoice"],["outstanding_amount","Sales Invoice"],["sales_partner","Sales Invoice"],["cfdi_status","Sales Invoice"]],"order_by":"`tabSales Invoice`.`modified` desc","add_totals_row":0,"page_length":500,"column_widths":{"name":120,"status":120,"title":120,"grand_total":120,"outstanding_amount":173,"sales_partner":120,"cfdi_status":120},"group_by":null}
name: Cobranza por Vendedor
query:
select 
a.posting_date as "Fecha:Date:200",
a.name  as "Folio:Link/Sales Invoice:120", 
a.customer as "Cliente:Link/Customer:450", 
a.grand_total as "Total Facturado:Currency:150",
a.currency as "Moneda", 
case when a.currency = 'USD' then NULL else  (a.outstanding_amount) / 1 end as "Debe MXN:Currency:100", 
case when a.currency = 'MXN' then NULL else  (a.outstanding_amount) / a.conversion_rate end as "Debe USD:Currency:100", 
a.agente as "Agente A",
e.operador as "Agente", 
a.direccion as "Direccion::800",
i.ruta as "Ruta"
from
`tabSales Invoice` a left join
`tabvariables` e on a.name = e.parent left join
`tabCustomer` i on a.customer_name = i.name
where a.customer != 'VENTAS DE CONTADO' and a.customer != 'CHARROS' and a.customer != 'VENTAS DE CONTADO - 1' and a.status != 'PAID' and a.docstatus = 1
